formattedAddress: 310 W 56th St #1h, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 310 W 56th St #1h, New York, NY 10019-4265, USA

originalText.text: With one exception, Dr. Alan Teitzman DDS in Washington, DC - may he rest in peace - Dr. Sofer is the best dental experience I have every had in my life; he is highly skilled, personable, and knowledgable. The setting is an uptown office near the Hearst Building. Sofer's office is through the lobby and is small, modern, clean and comfortable. He has a quality and expectations credo he tells you before he begins work, and he follows it. He fit me in right away for a broken tooth that I was flipping out about before my next acting class. And the his work was so incredibly good that I am unable to fully describe how happy I am -- overjoyed doesn't do it. Other doctors have worked on this tooth and I have not been happy with the outcome, although they were all to happy to charge me for the crappy work they did; never making it look or feel right. Dr. Sofer was the only dentist who really understood the tooth's (and my bite's) issues and took care of it properly. It looks amazing. I will continue to act, and audition. Actors teeth are extremely important, they have to have perfect teeth, but I was not blessed with perfect teeth. So additionally, Dr. Sofer worked with me to devise a plan of how we would improve my smile. He was in network for me, so there was no charge for work that I consider absolutely priceless. I rarely give glowing reviews. This is one of them.

originalText.text: First time at the dentist in two years. He made the whole experience very comfortable, especially as a new patient. Explained all of my options. Gave me 100% of his attention. Really a pro at what he does. Will definitely use him as my primary dentist in the long run! Would 100% recommend.

text.text: First time at the dentist in two years. He made the whole experience very comfortable, especially as a new patient. Explained all of my options. Gave me 100% of his attention. Really a pro at what he does. Will definitely use him as my primary dentist in the long run! Would 100% recommend.

originalText.text: Staff is really friendly. Dentist is experienced and deeply knowledgable. He really takes his time with you; never a rush for the next customer. I've been here several times now and I would highly recommend him if you're in the area and looking for a dentist.

text.text: Staff is really friendly. Dentist is experienced and deeply knowledgable. He really takes his time with you; never a rush for the next customer. I've been here several times now and I would highly recommend him if you're in the area and looking for a dentist.

originalText.text: I've gone to Dr. Sofer for several years... at first it was convenience because I worked nearby. But after many cleanings, wisdom tooth extractions, and follow up to a particularly bothersome crown. I enjoy my appointments, Aide is awesome, Charlie is super friendly, and I come out smiling regardless of the damage caused by Mike and Ikes!!!

text.text: I've gone to Dr. Sofer for several years... at first it was convenience because I worked nearby. But after many cleanings, wisdom tooth extractions, and follow up to a particularly bothersome crown. I enjoy my appointments, Aide is awesome, Charlie is super friendly, and I come out smiling regardless of the damage caused by Mike and Ikes!!!

originalText.text: Excellent dentist with a conservative approach. Takes the time to communicate with patients; I never feel rushed and always feel taken care of.

text.text: Excellent dentist with a conservative approach. Takes the time to communicate with patients; I never feel rushed and always feel taken care of.
